stimulusHtml: During what intervals of time is the particle moving to the left? Give a reason for your answer.

features.html: A particle moves long the x-axis so that its velocity v at any time t, for  0 ≤ t ≤ 16 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3CAC@ is given by v(t) = e2sint - 1. At time t = 0, the particle is at the origin.
